an3.74:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anando vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an3.74:1.2: Atha kho abhayo ca licchavi panditakumarako ca licchavi yenayasma anando tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinno kho abhayo licchavi ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an3.74:1.3: “nigantho, bhante, nataputto sabbannu sabbadassavi aparisesam nanadassanam patijanati:
an3.74:1.4: ‘carato ca me titthato ca suttassa ca jagarassa ca satatam samitam nanadassanam paccupatthitan’ti.
an3.74:1.5: So purananam kammanam tapasa byantibhavam pannapeti navanam kammanam akarana setughatam.
an3.74:1.6: Iti kammakkhaya dukkhakkhayo, dukkhakkhaya vedanakkhayo, vedanakkhaya sabbam dukkham nijjinnam bhavissati—
an3.74:1.7: evametissa sanditthikaya nijjaraya visuddhiya samatikkamo hoti.
an3.74:2.1: “Tisso kho ima, abhaya, nijjara visuddhiyo tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sammadakkhata sattanam visuddhiya sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya.
an3.74:2.3: Idha, abhaya, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an3.74:2.4: So navanca kammam na karoti, purananca kammam phussa phussa byantikaroti.
an3.74:2.5: Sanditthika nijjara akalika ehipassika opaneyyika paccattam veditabba vinnuhiti.
an3.74:3.1: Sa kho so, abhaya, bhikkhu evam silasampanno vivicceva kamehi …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an3.74:3.2: So navanca kammam na karoti, purananca kammam phussa phussa byantikaroti.
an3.74:3.3: Sanditthika nijjara akalika ehipassika opaneyyika paccattam veditabba vinnuhiti.
an3.74:4.1: Sa kho so, abhaya, bhikkhu evam samadhisampanno asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an3.74:4.2: So navanca kammam na karoti, purananca kammam phussa phussa byantikaroti.
an3.74:4.3: Sanditthika nijjara akalika ehipassika opaneyyika paccattam veditabba vinnuhiti.
an3.74:4.4: Ima kho, abhaya, tisso nijjara visuddhiyo tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sammadakkhata sattanam visuddhiya sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
an3.74:5.1: Evam vutte, panditakumarako licchavi abhayam licchavim etadavoca:
an3.74:5.2: “kim pana tvam, samma abhaya, ayasmato anandassa subhasitam subhasitato nabbhanumodasi”ti?
an3.74:5.3: “Kyaham, samma panditakumaraka, ayasmato anandassa subhasitam subhasitato nabbhanumodissami.
an3.74:5.4: Muddhapi tassa vipateyya yo ayasmato anandassa subhasitam subhasitato nabbhanumodeyya”ti.
